content: मौल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ला, --ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मूलं वेत्ति मूलादागतो वा अण्] {@--1@} Radical, original. {@--2@} Ancient, old, of long standing (as a custom). {@--3@} Nobly born, of a good family. {@--4@} Brought up in the service of a king for generations, holding office from ancient times, hereditary; <ls>Ms. 7. 54</ls>; <ls>R. 19 57.</ls> --लः An old or hereditary minister; (प्रकृतयः) मौलैरानाययामासुर्भरतं स्तंभिताश्रभिः <ls>R. 12. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 10</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 38</ls>.
